sum_bart: The Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to hold a meeting on April 25, 2025. The meeting will consider and approve the standalone and consolidated audited financial results of the company for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2025, among other matters.
sum_peg: Dear Sirs, we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Friday, April 25, 2025 , inter alia, to: i.
sum_t5: Reliance Industries Limited Board Meeting - Friday, April 25, 2025 (as per the Regulations) - RELATED TO FINANCIAL RESULTS OF THE COMPANY

sum_bart: Reliance Global Project Services Pte. Ltd. (RGPSPL), a step-down wholly  owned  subsidiary of the Company, commenced member ’s voluntary liquidation. The affairs of RGPSPL have been wound up.
sum_peg: Sub: Disclosure under Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 - Dissolution of Reliance Global Project Services Pte.
sum_t5: Reliance Global Project Services Pte. Ltd. (RGPSPL) commenced member ’s voluntary liquidation and the affairs of RGPSPL have been wound up . Necessary return for dissolution of RGPSPL has been filed with the Accounting and Corporate Regulatory Authority, Singapore , on April 16, 2025 . In terms of Singapore laws, RGPSPL shall stand dissolved effective mid-July, 2025. RGPSPL’s turnover and networth was Rs. 3.48 crore and Rs. 1.11 crore, respectively , as on March 31,

sum_bart: Nauyaan Tradings Private Limited (NTPL), a step -down wholly owned subsidiary of the Company has informed the Company that it has today completed the acquisition of a further 10% equity stake in the company.
sum_peg: Sub: Disclosure under Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 - Completion of acquisition of further 10% equity stake in Nauyaan Shipyard Private Limited
sum_t5: Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 – Completion of acquisition of further 10% equity stake in Nauyaan Shipyard Private Limited

sum_bart: Nauyaan Tradings Private Limited (NTPL), a step -down wholly owned subsidiary of the Company has today informed the Company that it has today entered into an agreement to acquire a further 10% equity stake in the company.
